channel.title: Need someone smart 2 edit my server
channel.description:
NEED SOMEONE SMART 2 EDIT MY SERVER.
I have my own server and it is all good. The only thing about it is ice barrage doesn't work and neither does ::pnpc. If someone can change this for me would they because if have tried and it wont work. If youll help me ill send you the server so you can edit it for me.
Reward: Now i can't really think of any but u could have an admin on my server?

item.title: Need someone smart 2 edit my server
item.dc:creator: @Paradise_God Paradise God
item.description:
@Paradise_God wrote:

runescapekid, Look around on the Tutorial section, There’s a tutorial to suit everyone’s need there.
And is your server actually online?
And have you made the commands ::pncp?
If not, try them.

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone smart 2 edit my server

item.source: Need someone smart 2 edit my server

item.title: Need someone smart 2 edit my server
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

Okay, editing the server isn’t that hard really. There’s a TuT for just about everything here on the forums. There’s actually a TuT on full Barrage, so all you have to do is go to the Tutorial Section and search ‘Full Barrage’ and it should pop up (or browse the forums, because you have to use Google atm) … Then just open up the client, follow the steps, and compile

Open your client and search for your pnpc command, make sure that it doesn’t say

&& playerName.equalsIgnorecase(username)) < Should be like that, I done that off the top of my head

If it isn’t like that, just make sure that your playerRight’s is the correct level for it (1,2,3)
and if that doesn’t help, search for a TuT or compair sources with a working pnpc on it…

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone smart 2 edit my server
